net.algem.billing

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.algem.billing.Item
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, GemModel

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
implements GemModel
    Item usable for invoice creation. An item may be created regardless of invoice.
    Since:
    2.3.a 22/12/11
    See Also:
